normal.name: Cat Shadow Arrow
normal.description: Deals wind damage equal to 120% of Attack to designated enemy unit.

auto.name: Cat! Bomb!
auto.description: Deals wind damage equal to 72% of Attack to designated enemy and surrounding 4-meter range.

ultimate.name: Cat Bombing!
ultimate.description: Deals wind damage equal to 120% of Attack to designated enemy and surrounding 4-meter range.

passive.name: Cat Frenzy
passive.description: Every 5 normal attacks, the next normal attack deals wind damage equal to 120% of Attack to designated enemy and surrounding 4-meter range. With Awakening 2: Reduces trigger requirement from 5 to 4 normal attacks.

awakenings.effect: When the target's health is greater than 50%, all damage dealt by self increases by 20%.
Passive enhancement: Required normal attack count changes from 5 to 4.
[Skill] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4.
After using ultimate: Attack increases by 20% for 5 seconds.

memoryCard.name: Annoying Classroom
effects: When releasing ultimate skill: For each enemy on the field, ultimate skill damage increases by 12%, up to 5 stacks, lasting 5 seconds maximum bonus of 60% (12% Ã— 5 stacks)
